name: Dogfight (itch) (Sazazel)
description:
My second game for the Pico-8. Inspired by the old Amiga classic WINGS!.

Controls are again the standard Pico-8 keys. Arrows and Z and X

You have a radar of sorts. Enemies off the screen show up as dots near your plane to show you a direction.

Music credit must go out to Gruber and his awesome Pico-8 Tunes Volumes :)
